channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Lightroom
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Lightroom

item.title: CVE-2020-9724|2024-08-04T10:43:03.607Z -- adobe -- adobe%20lightroom
item.description: Adobe Lightroom versions 9.2.0.10 and earlier have an insecure library loading vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to privilege escalation.
